root.name: Capcom Classics Collection Reloaded
root.description: Each game's control scheme can be edited to your preferences.Some games support PSP's game sharing feature.Cheat codes for each game can be unlocked via the slot machine. They consist of things such as earning more points, having the ability to perform special attacks an unlimited amount of times, changing weapons with the touch of a button, etc.List of games194219431943 Kai: Midway KaisenCommandoEco FightersExed ExesGhosts 'N GoblinsGhouls 'N GhostsSuper Ghouls 'N GhostsGun.SmokeHigemaruThe King of DragonsKnights of the RoundMercsSon SonStreet Fighter IIStreet Fighter II Champion EditionStreet Fighter II Hyper FightingVulgusPS Vita CompatibilityDespite not being in the official compatibility list, Capcom Classics Collection Reloaded can be played on the PS Vita. To do this, the user must first download the game to the PS3. From there, go to Content Transfer on the PS Vita and select the game for transfer. Once complete, the game will show up on the Vita's menu.
